DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the efficacy and safety for steroid resistant, non-thymectomized MG patients.
DOC.brief_title: An Open Study for Steroid Resistant, Non-Thymectomized MG Patients
DOC.criteria: Clinically diagnosed as myasthenia gravis Those whose MG symptoms are not controlled by the treatment with prednisone Those who had undergone thymectomy
